channel.title: New York City on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in New York City on Life At The Circus

item.title: Christmastime in the Big Apple
item.description: About a month ago my youngest asked when we would see the Statue of Liberty again. We visited it a few years ago on our way to our Boston Vacation, and it has been a highlight memory of our youngest child ever since. He loves when we spot it on tv or in a picture somewhere. I replied, “Probably the next time we go to New York City.” To which he of course replied, “When can we go to New York City again?
